p:
The emergence of molecular typing technology has greatly changed the current situation and accelerated the discovery of novel enteroviruses, which have been increasingly reported
9, 22– 24 . Currently, there are only two EV-B83 full-length genomic sequences and twelve in the VP1 region with lengths over 600 bp available in GenBank. Moreover, the epidemiology of EV-B83 remain unclear, so research regarding EV-B83 is valuable.
